metadata.title: Cottmark Zip-up Fleece Hoodie
features: 8.3 oz., 70%/30% Cotton/Polyester (Black & Navy) & H/Grey is 65%/35% cotton/polyester. We specially use a blend of poly-cotton for making our hoodies more durable and breathable.
Heavy and Extra-soft stretchable Fleece perfect for daily use while at work or outdoors as well as lounging at home.
Designed in USA, this Jersey-lined Hoodie with color matched draw-cord & Antique metal zipper is made for the everyday wear and comfort.

Zip-front Hoodie featuring split kangaroo pockets to easily store any accessories or to keep your hands warm on a cold day. This hoodie is designed with a warmth-sealing ribbed cuff and bottom to help keep you insulated.
We make sure that strict inspection is carried out in the manufacturing process to achieve the highest quality standards.
description: Full-zip Hooded Fleece Jacket is made with fine ring-spun yarn which provides long-lasting strength and extra comfort with the softness of the fleece fabric. These super-durable hoodies are suitable for any day of the week. They have a (dyed to match) drawcord, a brass zipper and a front pouch/kangaroo pocket for easy use.

These hoodies are crafted with a 2Ã—1 rib on cuffs and bottom with a blend of spandex for everyday comfort. We've made the fabric stretchable so that it can be used while working out or for outdoor activities and everyday comfort.
